title: Towards a flexible software-defined network ecosystem
objective: The focus of the project is to enable added-value services to be provided thanks to SDN, on top of Internet Exchange Points and other network interconnnection fabrics. The services would relate not only to the flexibility of the interconnection fabric, but most importantly to enable the content and data centre ecosystem that is present at the interconnection fabric to collaborate. The ultimate goal is to create a service marketplace on top of the ecosystem composed of Cloud/data centers, networked applications, and the interconnection fabric.
participants: THE CHANCELLOR MASTERS AND SCHOLARS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CAMBRIDGE;IBM RESEARCH GMBH;UNIVERSITE CATHOLIQUE DE LOUVAIN;DE-CIX Management GmbH;CENTRE NATIONAL DE LA RECHERCHE SCIENTIFIQUE CNRS
